description: Transaction Information that is used moderately often.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: ORIGINATING_TAR_ID
columns.description: This item holds the originating temporary transaction�ID for this transaction. If the transaction is a charge, then the originating temporary transaction�ID will be the temporary transaction ID of the charge. If transaction is a payment, then the originating temporary transaction ID will be the payment temporary transaction ID unless the payment is from fast payment. In the fast payment case, the originating temporary transaction ID will be the charge temporary transaction ID.

columns.name: SOURCE_TAR_ID
columns.description: This item holds the source temporary transaction ID for this transaction.  The source temporary transaction ID will always be equal to the temporary transaction ID that generates the transaction.

columns.name: SRC_TAR_CHG_LINE
columns.description: Indicates the temporary transaction charge line this transaction originated from.

columns.name: PAT_AGING_DATE
columns.description: Aging date used for self-pay aged A/R

columns.name: INS_AGING_DATE
columns.description: Aging date used for insurance aged A/R

columns.name: HOSP_ACCT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the hospital account record ID for the transaction.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record that triggered this transaction. This item is not always populated if you use the Charge Router.

columns.name: CRD_ENC_FORM_NUM
columns.description: This is being deprecated in May 24 because it provides bad data in some instances. This column has been replaced by column CRD_CHARGE_SLIP_NO (I ETR 88) in the table ARPB_TX_MODERATE. To look up the deprecated column's value after the Clarity Compass upgrade, use the column CRD_CHARGE_SLIP_NO in table ARPB_TX_MODERATE to get the CRD_CHARGE_SLIP_NO value.

columns.name: EXT_REF_NUM
columns.description: External reference number.  This is a customer item that can be populated as they see fit.  Typically, this item is populated with data from an external system via an interface or transaction import.

columns.name: REFERENCE_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the reference number (check number) for a payment transaction.

columns.name: PMT_RECEIPT_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the receipt number for a payment transaction.

columns.name: PAT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the patient type for the patient on this transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REFERRAL_PROV_ID
columns.description: This stores this transaction's referral provider.  Note that this field is linked to the referral source master file and not the provider master file.

columns.name: REFERRAL_PROV_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: INSURANCE_AMT_PAID
columns.description: This item stores the insurance amount that has been paid on a charge transaction.

columns.name: WRITEOFF_EXCEPT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Yes-No write-off category number for a charge transaction. The value indicates whether the charge transaction was adjudicated as a write-off in charge entry and thus the insurance portion write-off is suppressed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


Yes, No NCC either

columns.name: PAT_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location associated with the patient for this transaction.

columns.name: ORIG_PRICE
columns.description: This item stores the original price of the transaction if the price was changed during charge entry.

columns.name: EXP_REIMB_DYNAMIC
columns.description: The expected reimbursement will be updated whenever reimbursement is calculated. This amount cannot exceed the charge amount.

columns.name: EXPECTED_REIMB
columns.description: The expected reimbursement calculated at charge entry. This item is not updated by any change during claims. Also, this amount cannot exceed the charge amount.

columns.name: COVERAGE_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The Plan (EPP) ID that is associated with this transaction.

columns.name: COVERAGE_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: CVG_PLAN_GROUP_ID
columns.description: This item stores the employer group (PPG) ID that is associated with this transaction.

columns.name: CVG_PLAN_GROUP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: MED_NEC_YN
columns.description:
This is the flag that is set in charge entry if medical necessity is needed for a transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: TECHNICAL_CHG_FL_YN
columns.description:
This flag is set to yes if the transaction is a technical charge.  This is only populated if using the split billing functionality.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MED_NEC_YN

columns.name: CNTR_DISCOUNT_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the pricing contract discount amount for a transaction.

columns.name: UNDIST_TX_DATE
columns.description: This items stores the date that a transaction was undistributed (unmatched).

columns.name: UNDIST_CHG_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user that unmatched a transaction.

columns.name: UNDIST_INSTANT
columns.description: This item stores the instant that a transaction was undistributed (unmatched).

columns.name: ORIGINAL_AMT_COPAY
columns.description: This item stores the original copay amount for the transaction.

columns.name: BAD_DEBT_CHG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the charges is written off to bad debt.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: AUTO_PAT_WO_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores if a transaction had its self-pay portion automatically written off.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


yes and new SST

columns.name: TX_USER_COMMENT
columns.description: The comments entered by users when they perform an action like transfer, retro, void, and undistribute on a transaction in Transaction Inquiry are stored in this item.

columns.name: CONTESTED_YN
columns.description:
This item stores a flag to determine if a transaction is contested.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CONTEST_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the reason that a transaction is contested if the transaction is contested.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Contested


Contested

columns.name: MEA_IDENTIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the measurement (MEA) identifiers that are entered in charge entry.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Original/Starting dosage


Test Results

columns.name: CRC_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the CRC code entered in charge entry.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


E1 - Spectacle Lenses


E2 - Contact Lenses


E3 - Spectacle Frames

columns.name: REIMB_CONTRACT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the allowed amount as calculated by the reimbursement contract. This amount can exceed the charge amount.

columns.name: EXT_CUR_AGENCY_ID
columns.description: The current collections agency.

columns.name: EXT_CUR_AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection agency.

columns.name: EXT_CURAGNCY_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current agency status category ID for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Sent to Agency


Returned

columns.name: EXTERNAL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the external transaction ID

columns.name: SURGICAL_LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the surgical log record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the OR_LOG table. This item is populated if charge is entered from OpTime.

columns.name: SUPPLY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the supply record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the OR_SPLY table.

columns.name: SUPPLY_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the implant record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the OR_IMP table.

columns.name: EXT_AGNCY_SENT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the charge was sent to its current agency.

columns.name: FIRST_SELFPAY_DATE
columns.description: This items stores the date when a charge first goes to self-pay.

columns.name: PROV_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The provider type for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Resource


Physician

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The claim record for the transaction.

columns.name: IS_WK_COMP
columns.description: Indicates whether the transaction is for worker's comp.

columns.name: EOB_UPDATED_DT
columns.description: Date in which the Explanation of�Benefits for this transaction was last updated.

columns.name: RAD_THER_COMP_TX_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID for radiation therapy component transactions and rollup charges.

columns.name: RAD_THER_END_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether Radiation Therapy is at the end of treatment for this transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


NO


YES

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: Start time of a timed procedure.

columns.name: STOP_TIME
columns.description: Stop time of a timed procedure.

columns.name: SERVICE_TIME
columns.description: Time when service is performed.

columns.name: PURCHASESERVICE_AMT
columns.description: This is the amount paid for or to be paid to a third party for performing a service. This field is used to report this amount on claims and statements along with price being charged to the payor or guarantor for the service.  This item should only be used if it is desired this purchased service information be reported on claims and statements.

columns.name: THIRD_PARTY_POS_ID
columns.description: The third party or reference lab where an individual purchased service was performed. This item is used to reference a Place of Service in order to report the address and National Provider Identifier of the third party on claims and statements. This item should only be used if it is desired this purchased service information be reported on claims and statements.

columns.name: MNL_RETRO_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The retroadjudication reason category ID for the transaction


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Addition/Deletion/Change in Patients


Change Patient Covered Flag


Change Patient Effective Date


Change Coverage Effective Date


New Coverages


Add Member


Change Member Effective Date


Remove Member


Add Account


Change Benefit Plan on Employer Group


Change Coverage Term Date


Change Member Term Date


Change Covered Status


Change Riders on Employer Group


Remove Benefit Plan from Employer Group


Change Activation Date on Employer Group


Change Termination Date on Employer Group


Change Effective Date due to Group Term Date


Change Term Date due to Group Effective Date


Change Coverages


Change Visit Coverage

The type of service category number associated with the transaction.

Medical Care


Surgery

columns.name: DX_PRIM_CODESET_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the primary diagnosis codeset for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


ICD-9-CM


ICD-10-CM


ICD-10-CA


ICD-10-UK


DBC


ICD-10 Dutch


ICD-10-AM


A&E Diagnoses


SKS

ICD-O-3

columns.name: DX_ALT_CODESET_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the alternate diagnosis codeset for the transaction.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DX_PRIM_CODESET_C_NAME

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The date on which a service is started.

columns.name: STOP_DATE
columns.description: The date on which a service was stopped.

columns.name: PROC_MINUTES
columns.description: The length of time in minutes that this procedure took.

columns.name: CRD_CHARGE_SLIP_NO
columns.description: The encounter form number associated with copay payments entered during scheduling.
